AMDDes: AMD damages the macular, and causes blurry vision |
AstigmatismDes: A common imperfection in the curvature of the eye |
BCDDes: A rare genetic disease where crystals build up in your cornea  |
BlepharitisDes: Caused by bacteria on your eyelids |
CRVODes: An eye condition that affects the retina |
CataractDes: A cloudy area in the lens of your eye |
ConjunctivitisDes: An inflammation or infection of the transparent membrane |
GlaucomaDes: Caused by damage to your optic nerve |
LazyEyeDes: An abnormal visual development early in life |
UveitisDes: The inflammation usually happens when an infection occurs. |
